title: Pay Phone
lyrics: I'm at a payphone trying to call home All of my change I spent on you Where have the times gone Baby it's all wrong, where are the plans we made for two? Yeah, I, I know it's hard to remember The people we used to be It's even harder to picture That you're not here next to me You say it's too late to make it But is it too late to try? And in our time that you wasted All of our bridges burned down I'll be out spending all this money while you sitting round All those fairytales are full of sh*tOne more stupid love song I'll be sick
